page.title: 07SMALL HOLDING (2)
page.content:
{See photograph,}and page 6 for the morning's activities
1600 Warm sugar beet to goats Start evening feeding Get poultry in 1830 Husband returns; carries water to fields and does heavy jobs such as moving hay 2000 Milk goats (as in morning) 2045 Walk dogs 2100{Feed selves!}
Housework, shopping and other chores such as fetching hay, straw etc fitted in when possible.
{WHY WE DO IT} We like to know how our food has been produced and that the animals we eat have not suffered fear and stress by being pushed through markets.
